question: [Calm] Italiano: Riporta which integer bin occurs most frequently dal istogramma.

qas.question: [Calm] Italiano: Riporta which integer bin occurs most frequently dal istogramma.
[Brief] Turkce: Histograma gore how many samples were used in total belirt.
[Focus] Polski: Podaj how many entries fall inside the modal bin na podstawie histogramu.
